summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Nexodify Forensic Engine - both backend APIs and frontend UI are functioning correctly

minor_issues.issue: Returns 422 instead of 401 when no file provided and no auth
minor_issues.impact: FastAPI validates request body before auth - expected behavior

minor_issues.issue: New Analysis sidebar link selector not found

passed_tests: Landing page loads with hero, features, pricing sections
Authentication flow works with session cookies
New Analysis page allows PDF upload interface
Assistant page provides AI Q&A functionality
Google Auth login redirects to Emergent Auth
Assistant AI responses working (tested with Italian question)
User quota and plan information displayed correctly
